text: The Association of Spanish Language Academies () is the highest institution of the Spanish language. It works in all countries that speak Spanish. It was established in 1951 in Mexico. The Association of Spanish Language Academies is headquartered in Madrid, Spain. It also has 22 other member organizations located in 21 other countries. ;List of member countries * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Other websites== * Category:Language regulators Category:Spanish language Category:Organizations based in Madrid Category:1951 establishments
title: Association of Spanish Language Academies
